simplesect.para: Only provide some typical data route, not all route listed. Users cannot combine any routes, once a new route is set, the precios one would be replaced.

briefdescription.para: The audio data transfer protocol choice. Sgtl5000 only supports I2S format and PCM format.

detaileddescription.para:
In this function, some configurations are fixed. The second parameter can be NULL. If users want to change the SGTL5000 settings, a configure structure should be prepared.
If the codec_config is NULL, it would initialize sgtl5000 using default settings. The default setting: sgtl_init_tcodec_config codec_config.route=sgtl_route_playback_record codec_config.bus=sgtl_bus_i2s codec_config.master=slave
context
Sgtl5000 context structure.
config
sgtl5000 configuration structure. If this pointer equals to NULL, it means using the default configuration.
Initialization status

briefdescription.para: Set audio data route in sgtl5000.

detaileddescription.para: This function would set the data route according to route. The route cannot be combined, as all route would enable different modules.

simplesect.para: If a new route is set, the previous route would not work.

detaileddescription.para:
Sgtl5000 only supports I2S, I2S left, I2S right, PCM A, PCM B format.
context
Sgtl5000 context structure.
protocol
Audio data transfer protocol.

briefdescription.para: Set sgtl5000 as master or slave.
Set the volume of different modules in sgtl5000.

detaileddescription.para: This function would set the volume of sgtl5000 modules. This interface set module volume. The function assume that left channel and right channel has the same volume.

sgtl_module_adc volume range: 0 - 0xF, 0dB - 22.5dB sgtl_module_dac volume range: 0x3C - 0xF0, 0dB - -90dB sgtl_module_hp volume range: 0 - 0x7F, 12dB - -51.5dB sgtl_module_lineout volume range: 0 - 0x1F, 0.5dB steps

parameterdescription.para: Sgtl5000 module, such as DAC, ADC and etc.
Volume value need to be set. The value is the exact value in register.

briefdescription.para: Get the volume of different modules in sgtl5000.

detaileddescription.para:
This function gets the volume of sgtl5000 modules. This interface get DAC module volume. The function assume that left channel and right channel has the same volume.
context
Sgtl5000 context structure.
module
Sgtl5000 module, such as DAC, ADC and etc.
Module value, the value is exact value in register.

parameterdescription.para: Sgtl5000 module, such as DAC, ADC and etc.
True means mute, and false means unmute.

briefdescription.para: Deinit the sgtl5000 codec. Shut down Sgtl5000 modules.

memberdef.argsstring: (sgtl_context_t *context, uint32_t mclk, uint32_t sample_rate, uint32_t bits)
memberdef.name: sgtl_config_data_format

briefdescription.para: Configure the data format of audio data.

detaileddescription.para:
This function would configure the registers about the sample rate, bit depths.
context
Sgtl5000 context structure pointer.
mclk
Master clock frequency of I2S.
sample_rate
Sample rate of audio file running in sgtl5000. Sgtl5000 now supports 8k, 11.025k, 12k, 16k, 22.05k, 24k, 32k, 44.1k, 48k and 96k sample rate.
bits
Bit depth of audio file (Sgtl5000 only supports 16bit, 20bit, 24bit and 32 bit in HW).

briefdescription.para: Write register to sgtl using I2C.

parameterdescription.para: Value needs to write into the register.

briefdescription.para: Read register from sgtl using I2C.

memberdef.argsstring: (sgtl_context_t *context, uint16_t reg, uint16_t clr_mask, uint16_t val)
memberdef.name: sgtl_modify_reg

briefdescription.para: Modify some bits in the register using I2C.

parameterdescription.para: The mask code for the bits want to write. The bit you want to write should be 0.
Value needs to write into the register.

briefdescription.para: Define the register address of sgtl5000.
